description: Try our easy to follow Lamb & Apricot Sosaties recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Lamb,Sesame free,Stone fruit,High protein,Soy free,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Lamb & Apricot Sosaties Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 red onions, cut into thin wedges
750g boneless lamb, trimmed, cut into 2.5cm cubes
6 cloves garlic, minced (save 4 whole cloves for later)

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium saucepan, combine jam, vinegar, 1/3 cup water, curry powder, garlic, coriander, ginger, cloves, allspice, cumin and pepper. Bring to the boil, then simmer over low heat for 5 minutes. Let the marinade cool completely.
Place the lamb in a large glass baking dish, add marinade and toss to coat evenly. Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours, tossing meat 2 or 3 times.
Place apricots in a bowl, cover with boiling water and set aside for 30 minutes to plump. Drain.

Remove lamb from marinade and thread onto skewers with apricots and onion (see tip). Transfer marinade to a saucepan with 1/3 cup water. Place over medium heat and bring to the boil. Simmer for 5 minutes, adding more water if too thick.

Preheat grill or barbecue. Cook the skewers for 12 minutes or until the lamb is slightly pink inside. Add lime halves to grill and cook for 2 minutes or until charred. Serve skewers with extra sauce, limes and garnished with coriander and mint.
